arguments.response_text: Hey everyone, my name is Joe. Favorite cultural traditions is being Irish. On St. Patrick's Day we celebrate by eating a lot of corned beef and cabbage and slamming a lot of beers. It's a really fun time. You should all experience celebrating St. Patrick's Day with real Irish people, and I hope you do one day.
arguments.response_summary: Joe introduces himself and shares his favorite cultural tradition, St. Patrick's Day, describing how it is celebrated and encouraging others to experience it.
arguments.matched_prompt: What are your favorite cultural traditions?
